activities: ChoreMonster's site and services are hosted in the United States. If you are visiting our site and services from outside the United States, you are transferring your personal data into the United States when you use the ChoreMonster site and service. Many regions, such as the European Union, have data collection protections that differ from U.S. law. If you are an European Union citizen, please see also the section entitled "BBB European Union Safe Harbor Program" for further information.

personaldata: Customer data that is not manually processed
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
